$ cat Dockerfile
FROM centos:latest
RUN yum -y update

RUN yum -y install httpd
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

RUN yum install httpd -y

ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/sbin/httpd","-D","FOREGROUND"]
